summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Human Services Department; authorizing an agreement with the Seattle-King County Workforce Development Council for financial assistance to conduct a Rewarding Youth Achievement program; creating certain positions, increasing the expenditure allowance in the 2001 budget of the Human Services Department by making a reimbursable appropriation; and ratifying and confirming prior acts, all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
committee: Housing, Human Services, Education and Civil Rights
